segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children on the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really going for it, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced on a two-step stool, and it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the legs are splayed, almost like it's about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His arm is stretched so far into that cabinet, grasping for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even holding a plate, probably to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing next to him is just as involved, her hand extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's patiently waiting for her share, a look of pure expectation on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring little operation they've got going on there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels so risky, and I worry he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, it could be a real mess, with cookies everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet reward, completely ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
